com.hxgraph.adapter

类 BarGraphAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hxgraph.adapter.GraphAdapterImp<BarGraphModel,BarGraphStrategyParam>
      • com.hxgraph.adapter.BarGraphAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IGraphAdapter<BarGraphModel,BarGraphStrategyParam>

    public class BarGraphAdapter
extends GraphAdapterImp<BarGraphModel,BarGraphStrategyParam>
    柱状图数据适配器,支持多个柱做同类对比 Created by liulinru on 2017/4/24.
